text: aur usakee nishaaniyon mein se yah bhee hai ki shubh soochana denevaalee havaen bhejata hai (taaki unake dvaara tumhen varsha kee shubh soochana mile) aur taaki vah tumhen apanee dayaaluta ka rasaasvaadan karae aur taaki usake aadesh se naukaen chalen aur taaki tum usaka anugrah (rozee) talaash karo aur kadaachit tum krtagyata dikhalao
